paper_context.workload: RTX 3090 concurrent encoder-style inference, FP16, fixed shape, deterministic rails
paper_context.goal: Pick the correct stability-performance operating point under load, not just maximize median speed.
notes: All latency numbers are request-level distributions under concurrent load.
Memory stability is treated as a first-class constraint via allocation-event deltas after warmup.
Arena mode is evaluated against eager and compiled+ATEN using the same shape and request profile.

svgs.label: Concurrency tails (RTX 3090, c=4/8)
svgs.caption: Primary latency-tail comparison used for operating-point selection.

svgs.label: CPU comparison (opt5 full v2)
svgs.caption: Latest standardized CPU adapter comparison currently published.

svgs.label: GPU comparison (opt5 full v2)
svgs.caption: Latest standardized GPU adapter comparison currently published.

svgs.label: PySpy flamegraph (steady-state, newest)
svgs.caption: Newest Python-side steady-state profile used to inspect dispatch/load overhead.

svgs.caption: Newest GPU kernel timeline flame from tuned3 profile run.
